content.prompt: In the third paragraph of the excerpt, which of the following pieces of evidence does de Gante use to support his argument about the emperor of Spain’s obligations to Native Americans?

choices.label: Native Americans have their own religious practices.
Native American workers were eager to fulfill the emperor’s wishes.
The emperor has benefited from the riches acquired in the Americas.
The royal governors have followed the crown’s decrees in the Americas.

topic.text: 1.6: Cultural Interactions Between Europeans, Native Americans, and Africans

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
